channel.title: PI server with full clan chat?
channel.description: Anyone got a PI server that has fully working clan chat? What I need: Clan actually works - Main thing lol Lootshare Clan saving (optional) - If a player makes a clan, he can't make another, as he already owns one. Auto clan login (again optional) - If you log out of the server while still in a clan, when you log in it logs you back into the clan Any other nifty clan related things

item.title: PI server with full clan chat?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

arham 4:

Project Insanity - Normal PI - All Dupes fixed. + Better Clan Chats [~90%?] = What you are looking for.

The clan chat I have was out of the normal Pi.
That one actually. it doesn’t work correctly. And that Better clan chat requires a better one than I have

Read full topic

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Anyone got a PI server that has fully working clan chat?
What I need:
Clan actually works - Main thing lol
Lootshare
Clan saving (optional) - If a player makes a clan, he can’t make another, as he already owns one.
Auto clan login (again optional) - If you log out of the server while still in a clan, when you log in it logs you back into the clan
Any other nifty clan related things
